royalPurple.description: A deep, regal purple symbolizing creativity, innovation, and digital sophistication.

electricViolet.description: Vivid accent hue providing energy and vibrancy; ideal for highlights and calls-to-action.

neonFuchsiaGlow.description: A glowing fuchsia tint used to simulate light reflections or subtle neon edges.

metallicSlate.description: A neutral base for typography or secondary UI elements to balance the brighter tones.
